device_token.description: The new device token assigned to the device. The format of the string should be a hexadecimal, zero padded string representation of a token \c NSData in groups of four bytes. For example, if the device token data is { 0x1, 0x2f, 0x4, 0xdc, 0x34, 0x3c, 0x5, 0x6c } with \c groupSize 3 will be returned as "012f04dc 343c056c". \c nil if the push notifications are disabled for the device
